name: ssh2.client.sftp.copyfile
description: Copies a file from every origin SSH2 client (or local) to every destination SSH2 client (or local). Existing files are overwritten.

originclient.description: The client to copy the file from. If left empty, the origin is assumed to be the localhost.

destinationclient.description: The client to copy the file to. If left empty, the destination is assumed to be the localhost.

done.description: Triggered when all copy actions have completed.
